bioAsHtml:
I love breakthrough technologies with real life business case to disrupt the world :-) - follow me on Twitter: @JpEncausse - where everything begins: http://encausse.net

Maker of S.A.R.A.H. (http://sarah.encausse.net) an Home Automation framework to command the Internet of Things using Native User Interface such as Voice Recognition, Gestures, ... powered by a community of +5000 members

After 12 years as R&D Engineer in Web Technologies on a Collaboration / NoSQL Software for Fortune 500 (OnPremise or SaaS)

I created WhatsHome for 2 years, as a CTO, conducting qualitative marketing research with innovative technologies (IoT & Computer Vision)

Then I became CTO at VISEO Innovation

acceptedTalks.title: Donnez une âme à vos assistants vocaux

bio:
I love breakthrough technologies with real life business case to disrupt the world :-)
- follow me on Twitter: @JpEncausse
- where everything begins: http://encausse.net

Maker of S.A.R.A.H. (http://sarah.encausse.net) an Home Automation framework to command the Internet of Things using Native User Interface such as Voice Recognition, Gestures, ... powered by a community of +5000 members

After 12 years as R&D Engineer in Web Technologies on a Collaboration / NoSQL Software for Fortune 500 (OnPremise or SaaS) 

I created WhatsHome for 2 years, as a CTO, conducting qualitative marketing research with innovative technologies (IoT & Computer Vision) 

Then I became CTO at VISEO Innovation
